text: Ba'ze az ahli kitoʙ hastand, ki ʙa Alloh va on ci ʙar şumo va on ci ʙar onho nozil şudaast, imon dorand va dar ʙaroʙari Alloh furūtan hastand va ojoti Allohro ʙa ʙahoi andak namefurūşand. Va inho dar haqiqat ahli kitoʙ va ʙarxurdoron az doniş va ilm hastand. Podoşi onho nazdi Parvardigoraşon ast. Hamono Alloh zudhisoʙgir ast
